resources.string: Error in Registration. Please try again!

Established in 2006, Emirates Express Documents Clearing Company was the first accredited national company in the field of tracking and clearing documents, operating under the certified annual contracts system and providing “Public Relations Officer” service through a dedicated team of Emirati PROs.\n\nEmirates Express Documents Clearing Company is member of Emirates Express Group-Dubai which comprises a number of companies that aim to stimulate and activate a diversified economy in the United Arab Emirates and to render integrated services which enhance the efficiency of corporate performance and success.

Services that provide businessmen the secretarial services and edit the records of the meetings for their business, as well as managing some of their own affairs such as organizing their appointments, and arrange meetings with other parties, in addition, arranging travel reservations, and moving to air planes or cars or stay in hotels and others.\n\nPlus, establishing companies and institutions to them, and do all the other businesses on the drafting of contracts, and contracts for establishment of private and public agencies, and other agencies.

Services for institutions and companies that operate in the preparation of documents, and document business and personal transactions for third party and complete the required details and submitted through the service of (Public Relations Officer) to ministries, departments, agencies, federal government institutions, and non-governmental institutions, by follow-up and completing them to those parties until the completion of related procedures.

Typing all the required applications from government and semi-governmental and other agencies, including the required application from the Ministry of Labour, the General Directorate of Residency and Foreigners Affairs, Department of Economic Development, Department of Tourism and Commerce Marketing, Dubai Chamber of Commerce, Dubai Municipality, Ministry of Foreign Affairs, General Headquarter of Dubai Police, Dubai Traffic Department, Ministry of Education, Emirates Post offices, Ministry of Economy and Commerce, Dubai Customs, General Pensions & Social Security Authority, Roads and Transport Authority, Ministry of Health, Dubai Health Authority, Dubai Electricity and Water Authority, Emirates Telecommunications Corporation - Etisalat, Real Estate Regulatory Agency, and other agencies.

Services of preparing additional copies of documents in different kinds, whether printed or recorded on audio tapes or video or on the films or was in the form of photographs, and whether it is done through the use of specialized enterprises in Printing, recording, copying, or the use of their own equipments.

Regular and simple Translation services for personal and commercial editors. In addition, carrying out the provision of services related to translation, such as proofreading, typing, photocopying documents by the competent authorities, as well as legal translation services that afforded by office-based clients with our offices through cooperation between us.

Services to individuals or companies to register their cars and vehicles to the competent authorities and traffic departments, including checking of vehicles in specialized workshops and completing the procedures for registering property and paying fees.

Includes offices that will operate on the issuance of papers and necessary documents for driving personal cars outside the country or for shipment or has passed the international border by such as issuing international driving licenses and the issuance of tickets for freight cars and the books of international traffic (Trip Ticket) in accordance with the AIT / FIA.

License Activities: Vehicles Registration Services, Documents Copying Services, Typing & Photocopying Services, Translation Services, Documents Clearing Services, Businessmen Services.
Includes firms which undertake to submit documents of commercial and personal transactions belonging to others to government and non-government bodies and following up these documents pending finalization of their formalities.
Includes firms engaged in providing to businessmen secretarial services, shorthand writing, minutes taking as well as managing their affairs by means of scheduling their time, airline booking, hotel reservation, receive and see off at the airport, arrange their meetings with other parties. Includes firms which carry out the copying of documents, whether printed, audio or video taped, photographed, microfilmed or otherwise. These firms may use their own facilities or those of other firms.
This includes offices which provide simple translation for ordinary personal and commercial letters and correspondences. This also includes services related to translation such as proofreading, typing, photocopying, attestation of documents etc.
Includes firms undertaking vehicles registration at traffic departments on behalf of other individuals and companies, involving mechanical testing at the specialized workshops and at the testing centers of the traffic departments, then to handle all the registration formalities.

License Includes firms perform as connecting link between commercial entities and the media to introduce and shed light on their activities and achievements as well as promoting corporate image through leaflets, produce information reflecting transparency, establish positive relations with customers by visits and participation in gatherings, enhance their employees sense of belonging.

License Activities: Power Generation, Transmission & Distribution Equipment Trading
Includes reselling of power stations turbines, generators, and reactors, transmission and feed equipment, distribution keys, panels, current rectifiers, control systems and others for private or public use.

License License Activities: Commercial Brokers
Includes firms that play as negotiator or intermediary between the contract"'"s parties to get their points of view closer to each other, conclude sale and purchase contracts in own name for the account of a third party, such a contract is called broker contract and usually in return of a commission or remuneration paid by the third party, also, these firms that can make sale and purchase contracts exclusively on their own names, while transactions are being executed for the account of other par

License License Activities: Building Cleaning Services
Includes firms which provide cleaning services to residential buildings, commercial and government offices etc. These services include cleaning floors, surfaces and glass and sweeping outer areas etc.

License License Activities: Auto Spare Parts & Components Trading, Auto Accessories Trading, Tires & Rims Trading, Used Auto Spare Parts & Requisites Trading, Batteries Trading, Off Road Karts & Spare Parts Trading
Includes reselling spare parts and to use fully or partially in repairing and maintaining motor vehicles, buses, trucks and trailers and other relevant requisites including oils, detergents, paints... Etc...
Includes the reselling accessories fitted in cars and vehicles such as, additional bumpers to adjust exterior, air deflectors to increase the car"'"s efficiency , baggage loading racks to diversify the car"'"s use , as well as sun and rain protectors and small trailers, also, devices fitted in public service vehicles such as police, ambulances and fire engines.
Includes reselling of various types of tires and requisites including casings, rims and tubes.
Includes reselling power generation and storage batteries for cars, boats, motorcycles and other machinery
Includes reselling three or four wheeled vehicles which run by petrol and used for recreation and sports, also, spare parts and components.

License License Activities: Automobile Trading, Buses, Trucks Trading, Used Vehicles Trading, Motorcycles & Spare Parts Trading, Trailers Trading
Includes reselling of motor vehicle for personal passenger use, or for commercial use including rental and taxi services. Includes reselling different passenger buses, as well as trucks and trailers for the transporting goods, liquid substances, building materials�etc.

License Activities: General Trading
Includes commercial firms engaged in importing, trading and re-exporting of any of the goods and products mentioned in details in trade category.
